title: How would you rate my voice and piano playing skills? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sorry, but to be honest, you need a lot more work. Specifically and foremost, you need to learn how to sing on key. Performing music is a skill like any other. Talent helps, but like any skill, what really counts is putting in the hours of practice. Practice for another 10,000 hours, and I’m sure you’ll see great improvement.
